Class NfcUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon.NfcUtils

  • public class NfcUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils class used to interact with the Infineon card via NFC.

      • readPublicKeyFromCard

        public static java.lang.String readPublicKeyFromCard(NfcTranceiver card,
                                                     int keyId)
                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                     NfcCardException
        Read public key from card
        Parameters:
        card - nfc card
        keyId - key to get
        Returns:
        public key as hexadecimal String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000

      • generateSignature

        public static byte[] generateSignature(NfcTranceiver card,
                                       int keyIndex,
                                       byte[] dataToSign)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       NfcCardException
        Generate an ECDSA signature
        Parameters:
        card - nfc card
        keyIndex - index of the key to use
        dataToSign - data to be signed (hash)
        Returns:
        signature data as byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000

      • generateNewSecp256K1Keypair

                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              NfcCardException
        Generate a new SECP-256k1 keypair on the card.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        Returns:
        index of the newly created key
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000
